title: Crikey There's a Tractor On the Farm
creator_credit: Comedia Productions, Stephen Mepham and Robert Grant
brief_description: An entertaining look at the need for safety precautions with farm tractors including the use of seatbelts and ear muffs. Written by Robert Grant. Cast: Maurie Fields, Simon Thorpe.
